## Description {#details}

This file defines the implementation for the loop cache analysis.

The implementation is largely based on the following paper: 

<CodeBlock>
  Compiler Optimizations for Improving Data Locality
  By: Steve Carr, Katherine S. McKinley, Chau-Wen Tseng
  http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/mckinley/papers/asplos-1994.pdf
</CodeBlock>

The general approach taken to estimate the number of cache lines used by the memory references in an inner loop is:
<ul>
<li>Partition memory references that exhibit temporal or spacial reuse into reference groups.</li>
<li>For each loop L in the a loop nest LN: a. Compute the cost of the reference group b. Compute the loop cost by summing up the reference groups costs</li>
</ul>

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### computeTripCount() {#a605f4ae007c6b19244c175eb1990abc1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static const SCEV &#42; computeTripCount (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp; L, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &amp; ElemSize, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Compute the trip count for the given loop <code>L</code> or assume a default value if it is not a compile time constant.

Return the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expression for the trip count.

Definition at line <a href="#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getInnerMostLoop() {#a8b3e30ba3a19f0debefc124b3682a1a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Loop &#42; getInnerMostLoop (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> &amp; Loops)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Retrieve the innermost loop in the given loop nest <code>Loops</code>.

It returns a nullptr if any loops in the loop vector supplied has more than one sibling. The loop vector is expected to contain loops collected in breadth-first order.

Definition at line <a href="#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopcacheanalysis-cpp">LoopCacheAnalysis.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TripCount &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting valid TripCount&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;TripCount=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;TripCount &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;RefCost = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Stride = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isConsecutive(L, Stride, CLS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39; the cost is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (TripCount&#42;Stride)/CLS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Stride != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stride should not be null for consecutive access!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(Stride-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), TripCount-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a> = SE.getConstant(WiderType, CLS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Stride = SE.getNoopOrAnyExtend(Stride, WiderType);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TripCount = SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(TripCount, WiderType);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;Numerator = SE.getMulExpr(Stride, TripCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round the fractional cost up to the nearest integer number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The impact is the most significant when cost is calculated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be a number less than one, because it makes more sense</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to say one cache line is used rather than zero cache line</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RefCost = SE.getUDivCeilSCEV(Numerator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Access is consecutive: RefCost=(TripCount&#42;Stride)/CLS=&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; &#42;RefCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the indexed reference is not &#39;consecutive&#39; the cost is proportional to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the trip count and the depth of the dimension which the subject loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subscript is accessing. We try to estimate this by multiplying the cost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the trip counts of loops corresponding to the inner dimensions. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example, given the indexed reference &#39;A&#91;i&#93;&#91;j&#93;&#91;k&#93;&#39;, and assuming the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i-loop is in the innermost position, the cost would be equal to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterations of the i-loop multiplied by iterations of the j-loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RefCost = TripCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = getSubscriptIndex(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Index &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Could not locate a valid Index&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = Index + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#aef3d54c9ec716d007cb7ba0b2deab8b5">getNumSubscripts</a>() - 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;AR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/indexedreference/#a06a4b381bd3760668fd5b5e3c42bc1c3">getSubscript</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(AR &amp;&amp; AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting valid loop&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;TripCount =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="#a605f4ae007c6b19244c175eb1990abc1">computeTripCount</a>(&#42;AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>(), &#42;Sizes.back(), SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(RefCost-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), TripCount-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For the multiplication result to fit, request a type twice as wide.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WiderType = WiderType-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ac59306eb826e349ac7429736b1506432">getExtendedType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RefCost = SE.getMulExpr(SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(RefCost, WiderType),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              SE.getNoopOrZeroExtend(TripCount, WiderType));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">               &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Access is not consecutive: RefCost=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; &#42;RefCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RefCost &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting a valid RefCost&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempt to fold RefCost into a constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CacheCostTy is a signed integer, but the tripcount value can be large</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and may not fit, so saturate/limit the value to the maximum signed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// integer value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ConstantCost = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(RefCost))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ConstantCost-&gt;getValue()-&gt;getLimitedValue(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/indent">indent</a>(4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;RefCost is not a constant! Setting to RefCost=InvalidCost &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IndexedReference::isConsecutive(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;&amp;Stride,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CLS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The indexed reference is &#39;consecutive&#39; if the only coefficient that uses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the loop induction variable is the last one...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;LastSubscript = Subscripts.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;Subscript : Subscripts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subscript == LastSubscript)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isCoeffForLoopZeroOrInvariant(&#42;Subscript, L))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...and the access stride is less than the cache line size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;Coeff = getLastCoefficient();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;ElemSize = Sizes.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;WiderType = SE.getWiderType(Coeff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), ElemSize-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This assumes that all values are signed integers which may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be incorrect in unusual codes and incorrectly use sext instead of zext.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (uint32&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; 512; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   uint8&#95;t trunc = i;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   A&#91;trunc&#93; = 42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This consecutively iterates twice over A. If &#96;trunc&#96; is sign-extended,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would conclude that this may iterate backwards over the array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, LoopCacheAnalysis is heuristic anyway and transformations must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not result in wrong optimizations if the heuristic was incorrect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Stride = SE.getMulExpr(SE.getNoopOrSignExtend(Coeff, WiderType),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         SE.getNoopOrSignExtend(ElemSize, WiderType));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEV &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a> = SE.getConstant(Stride-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(), CLS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Stride = SE.isKnownNegative(Stride) ? SE.getNegativeSCEV(Stride) : Stride;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SE.isKnownPredicate(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78ba91d86a4753c8bd7624e01bf565d87f8e">ICmpInst::ICMP&#95;ULT</a>, Stride, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targettransforminfo-cpp/#af6ab0b42b53810d4456cb51537349222">CacheLineSize</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CacheCost implementation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for (i = N; i &gt; 0; i--)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// having the same cost calculation as a single dimention access pattern</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   for (i = 0; i &lt; N; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     A&#91;i&#93; = A&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when in actuality, depending on the array size, the first example</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should have a cost closer to 2x the second due to the two cache</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">       </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// access per iteration from opposite ends of the array</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::optional&lt;bool&gt; HasTemporalReuse =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;hasTemporalReuse(Representative, &#42;TRT, &#42;InnerMostLoop, DI, AA);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::optional&lt;bool&gt; HasSpacialReuse =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;hasSpacialReuse(Representative, CLS, AA);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((HasTemporalReuse &amp;&amp; &#42;HasTemporalReuse) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (HasSpacialReuse &amp;&amp; &#42;HasSpacialReuse)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RefGroup.push&#95;back(std::move(R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a2f63e339cd88f5a8e97a8150ea9129d2af29ddbfb905eb2593fdcdfb243f9af85">Added</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Added) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41a90a6262b81ec6c4f9db15111b6825">ReferenceGroupTy</a> RG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(std::move(R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RefGroups.push&#95;back(std::move(RG));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
